title: Linux uniq Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the uniq command in Linux, learn its syntax, and discover practical examples to remove duplicate lines and count unique occurrences in text files.

meta.title: Linux uniq Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the uniq command in Linux, learn its syntax, and discover practical examples to remove duplicate lines and count unique occurrences in text files.
meta.keywords: Linux, uniq command, text processing, duplicate lines, unique lines, file manipulation
